channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed

item.title: These Black Friday Lego flower deals include my favorite model – save up to 34%
item.description: I’m a huge fan of Lego’s Botanicals sets for adults – and all the best sets I own are receiving massive Black Friday discounts.

item.title: Samsung's wearables are up to 40% off for Black Friday on the official AU store — save big on smart watches, earbuds and smart rings
item.description: Build your ultimate Samsung ecosystem for less, thanks to some exceptional wearables deals this Black Friday.

item.title: This ridiculously low price made me do a double-take - snag the NZXT Lift Elite Wireless for just $19.99 during Black Friday
item.description: Save 75% on the NZXT Lift Elite Wireless gaming mouse during Black Friday sales.

item.title: Cloudflare explains Tuesday’s outage that temporarily took down ChatGPT
item.description: A blog post published Tuesday night by Cloudflare co-founder and CEO Matthew Prince has details on what caused its “worst outage since 2019,” pinning the issue to a problem in the Bot Management system that is supposed to control which automated crawlers are allowed to scan particular websites using its CDN. Cloudflare said last year […]

item.title: The all-electric Jeep Recon is finally here
item.description: The Jeep Recon, an all-electric SUV with an estimated 250 miles of range, is here, and I couldn’t be more surprised. Here’s why. Three years ago, Jeep unveiled how it was reshaping its portfolio with the launch of three EVs — two of which were bound for the North American market by 2024. The all-electric […]

item.title: Trump Lovingly Pats Elon Musk on Stomach During Dinner at White House
item.description: The billionaire seems to be back in Trump's good graces.
